<title level="1" right="Trait">[Skeleton](/Traits.aspx?ID=236)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

This undead is made by animating a dead creature’s skeleton with negative energy.
